name: VirtKick
description: [VirtKick](https://www.virtkick.io/) is your self-hosted DigitalOcean. Take cloud back to your computer, home network or a dedicated server. Manage virtual machines, Docker containers and create 1-click apps.

ohloh.description: Take Cloud Back - Your self-hosted VPS panel, similar to DigitalOcean.
ohloh.name: VirtKick
